languages.text: This carapace grants the wearer +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer has moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +2 deflection against human enemies.

traits.locale_text: This carapace grants the wielder +1 deflection and +10% armour if the wielder has moved during their turn. Base armour property: +2 deflection against human enemies.
This carapace grants the wearer +1 deflection and +10% armour if the wearer has moved during their turn. Base armour property: +2 deflection against human enemies.

languages.text: Este caparazón proporciona al portador +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} y +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} si el portador se ha movido en su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Propiedad básica de armadura: +2 de desvío contra enemigos humanos.

traits.locale_text: Este caparazón proporciona al portador +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} y +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} si el portador se ha movido en su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Propiedad básica de armadura: +2 de desvío contra enemigos humanos.

languages.text: 如果装备者在本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内移动过，此护甲会额外提供+1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}与+10%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。 基础护甲特性：对抗人类之敌时，获得+2偏转。
languages.original_text: This carapace grants the wearer +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer has moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +2 deflection against human enemies.

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者在本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内移动过，此护甲会额外提供+1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}与+10%{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}。 基础护甲特性：对抗人类之敌时，获得+2偏转。

languages.text: Cette carapace confère à l'utilisateur +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} et +10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} s'il s'est déplacé pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base : +2 de déflexion contre les ennemis humains.
languages.original_text: This carapace grants the wearer +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer has moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +2 deflection against human enemies.

traits.locale_text: Cette carapace confère à l'utilisateur +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} et +10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} s'il s'est déplacé pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base : +2 de déflexion contre les ennemis humains.

languages.text: Dieser Rückenpanzer gewährt dem Träger +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} und +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}, falls er sich während seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} bewegt hat. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +2 Ablenkung gegen menschliche Feinde.
languages.original_text: This carapace grants the wearer +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer has moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +2 deflection against human enemies.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Rückenpanzer gewährt dem Träger +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} und +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}, falls er sich während seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} bewegt hat. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +2 Deflektion gegen menschliche Feinde.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に移動した場合、このカラペースは{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}+1と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}+10%を付与する。 基本アーマー特性：人間の敵に対して回避+2。

traits.locale_text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に移動した場合、このカラペースは{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g} +1と{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g} +10%を付与する。 基本アーマー特性：人間の敵に対して回避 +2

languages.text: Этот панцирь увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} на 1 и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на 10%, если персонаж двигается в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Базовое свойство: +2 к отражению атак врагов-людей.

languages.text: Bu kabukzırhı giyen kişi, kendi {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} esnasında hareket etmişse +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} ve +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} kazanır. Taban zırh özelliği: İnsan düşmanlara karşı +2 saptırma.
